attributes.action: To cancel module R066 in Business marketing and enterprise.
attributes.additional_details: At the start of the academic year teachers were informed that the module R066 was not necessary.It is already 7 weeks into the term and students have lost around 4/5 months of education and they won’t be able to learn all the content they need which has just been deemed as necessary by ofqual. students already have to catch up in other lessons. there’s no way they will complete everything they need to do within that short amount of time.
attributes.background: To get Ofqual to take into account that half of the GCSEs that these current year 11s are doing are  not feasible.

rejection.details:
The Government sets the subject content for business GCSEs, and Ofqual has published details of changes it requires exam boards to make to exams and assessments next year, but the content of individual courses is a matter for course providers, not the Government or House of Commons.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Reduce curriculum content for year 10 & 12 students who will sit exams in 2021: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/320772
